title: Drawing, "Child on a Sled", 1940
medium: Pen and black ink on Chinese white ground
description: Child on bob sled coasting. Figure in black silhouette against a Chinese white background in shape of pointed oval.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Child on a Sled", 1940.
1940. Pen and black ink on Chinese white ground. Gift of Christina Malman. 1947-110-1.
